ch0284_00_seki/0101_0701_02_10:
If there’s something you need to do, let’s get on
it as soon as we can! Time is precious.
ch0284_00_seki/7101_0701_01_10:
It seems people and Pokémon exist in close
harmony on this island.
ch0284_00_seki/7101_0701_02_10:
Pokémon are not to be feared, but to be
trusted, huh...
ch0284_00_seki/7101_0701_03_10:
A world where people and Pokémon live side by
side... Not bad.
ch0284_00_seki/7102_0701_01_10:
By knowing what happened in the past, you can
build a better future.
ch0284_00_seki/7102_0701_02_10: Time is something that flows continuously.
ch0284_00_seki/7102_0701_03_10:
The long accumulation of time has culminated in
the two of us, here, standing beside one another.
ch0284_00_seki/7103_0701_01_10:
Throughout life, you’ll often meet people who think
differently than you.
ch0284_00_seki/7103_0701_02_10:
And sometimes you need to keep an open mind
and accept those ideas...
ch0284_00_seki/7103_0701_03_10:
But it’s never good to change the core of what you
believe in.
ch0284_00_seki/7104_0701_02_10:
I get overwhelmed with the feeling that I’m
wasting my time, and I fear that I’m slighting
mighty Dialga.
ch0284_00_seki/7105_0701_01_10: There are many ways you can spend your time.
ch0284_00_seki/7105_0701_02_10:
You can spend it on yourself or spend it
on others.
ch0284_00_seki/7105_0701_03_10:
It seems like you spend a lot of time on others,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0284_00_seki/1701_0701_01_10: Hey! Let me give this to you!
ch0284_00_seki/1701_0702_01_10: Don’t hoard it—use it right away!
ch0284_00_seki/2501_0701_01_10: Time is limited—whatever you do, it’ll get spent.
ch0284_00_seki/2501_0701_02_10:
That’s why you shouldn’t waste a single second of
the time you’ve been given. You really need to
treasure it.
ch0284_00_seki/2501_0701_03_10:
That’s the Diamond Clan’s belief, and we believe
in almighty Sinnoh—I mean mighty Dialga!
ch0284_00_seki/2501_0702_01_10:
I believe mighty Dialga purposefully gave all life
a limited amount of time.
ch0284_00_seki/2501_0702_02_10:
Time isn’t infinite—that’s why we need to find
what we can do in the moment and give it
our best!
ch0284_00_seki/2511_0701_02_10:
that in this era, there are Poké Balls that become
progressively more effective at catching Pokémon
the longer you wait.
ch0284_00_seki/2511_0701_03_10:
Argh! Who did this?! Who made such a vexing
Poké Ball?!
ch0284_00_seki/2511_0702_01_10:
What? There are Poké Balls that work best if
they’re used the moment you meet a Pokémon?
ch0284_00_seki/2511_0702_02_10:
That’s great! What an amazing invention—it
doesn’t waste time!
ch0284_00_seki/3001_0701_01_10:
Waking up early is great! It’s an effective use of
your time, and the early bird catches the worm!
ch0284_00_seki/3003_0701_01_10:
Right, let’s do what we have to while the sun’s
still out!
ch0284_00_seki/3005_0701_01_10: Is that the time already? Time flies so quickly...
